question: 転ぶ
sourceMnemonic: Do you remember the word <ja>転がる</ja>? This is kind of similar, instead of rolling, this is more for when something falls and hits the ground. It means <vocabulary>to fall over</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>to fall down</vocabulary>. Just imagine someone falling off a chair face first into the dirt and making a <ja>ぶ</ja> sound.
sourceReadingMnemonic: The reading comes from <ja>転がる</ja>. Hopefully you know that one well enough to associate it with this one, meaning you can read them both.
